headline: Evergy: Growth Offset By Looming Equity Dilution
summary: Evergy has benefited from AI data center optimism and a strong stock rally, but recent demand growth remains modest and industrial activity is uncertain.

raw.headline: Evergy: Growth Offset By Looming Equity Dilution

headline: Evergy: Powers Ahead With $17.5B CapEx And Bullish Technicals, A Hold Fundamentally
summary: Evergy offers stable utility exposure with a robust 4-6 GW economic development pipeline. Read why I am optimistic about EVRG stock, but rate it a Hold now.
